resources.string:
twrp build Status :- 

 Pending. 
 
 What now ? 
 
 Check this app next day if you "don't see download button

Backup Recovery :- 

 This option backups your 

 recovery , mounts and 
 fingerprint of device . 
 You will not 
 see this option once you have clicked (delete TwrpBuilder/ folder to restore button).

Upload Bakcup :- 

 This option allows you to upload recovery Backup made from app (you "can't" upload if you have done 
 one time ).

Download Recovery :- 

 This option allows to download recovery if "it's" ready on server (This button is hidden and shown when all processes is done ).
\n Recovery is ready ! \n Test recovery and send ne email it works or not
